ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-03-07
          -TWG chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy instructed secretariat to prepare a letter to the Com on Rules asking that all bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector be referred to three coms, namely Com on Govt Reorg (as lead) and the Com on Govt Enterprises and Public Works and Highways. HR 1106 is deemed included in this group.
